channel.title: Odd crash
channel.description:
[code] [java] Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.util.ConcurrentModificationException [java] at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(AbstractList.java:372) [java] at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(AbstractList.java:343) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.ClientUpdater.sendQueuedPackets(ClientUpdater.java:137) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.processClients(GameEngine.java:249) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:157)[/code]
I've had my server crash twice over the past few days with this error. Not sure what it is saying.

item.title: Odd crash
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Fixed it, thanks.

The NPC handler was using an AND for !wielding the stake && garlic <0 and it was crashing.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd crash
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

Two callers are modifying the AbstractList at the same time, e.g. one is trying to remove something while the other one is adding it.

Read full topic
